content: hats for mini ag and lori dolls by dawn smith you will need  #10 crochet cotton worked double or #3 crochet cotton  1 80 mm metal crochet hook size 6 or size hook to give you the needed measurement abbreviations ml - magic loop chain chain double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet flo front loop only blo back loop only there isn t a stated gauge i suggest you start with a size 6 hook if your circle measures 1 across after round 2 you are in gauge if not you will need to either go up or down a hook size chain 2 at the beginning of a round does not count as a double_crochet all joins will be done as in round 1 version 1 pattern starts here start by making a magic_ring round 1 chain 2 8 double_crochet in the magic_ring join to first double_crochet with a slip_stitch pull the circle closed 8 dcs round 2 chain 2 2dc in each stitch around join 16 dcs mine measures 1 across at this point round 3 chain 2 double_crochet 2dc in the next stitch repeat * around join 24 dcs mine measures 1 3/8 across here round 4 chain 2 double_crochet in each stitch around join round 5 chain 2 double_crochet in each stitch around join round 6 chain 2 flo 2dc in each stitch around join 48 dcs i like to finish here with a round of crab stitch also called reverse single_crochet it s optional but well worth learning how to do if you don t already know how it gives the hat a nice firm finished edge if you are using #10 doubled i suggest only using one strand for the crab stitch edge it s daintier and easier heathered version 1 hat with solid band this hat uses two different colors a and b of #10 cotton held together for everything but the solid band and crab stitch edging before starting cut a two-yard length of the color you want to make the solid band color a set the cut piece aside pattern starts here the directions are the same as version 1 above except for a color change in round 5 for round 5 drop color b but don t cut it pick up the color a piece you set aside this round is crocheted with two strands of color a held together drop the cut strand of color a at the end of the round after joining and pick color b back up to continue with round 6 do the optional crab stitch edging with color a version 2 flat top wide brim pattern starts here rounds 1-3 are the same as version 1 above round 4 chain 2 blo double_crochet around join round 5 chain 2 double_crochet around join round 6 chain 2 double_crochet 2dc in the next stitch repeat * around join 36 dcs round 7 chain 2 double_crochet 2 2dc in the next stitch repeat * around join 48
